statements: DELETE FROM loan_approval_processes WHERE credit_score > 700 AND approval_status = 'approved';
DELETE FROM ApprovalCriteria WHERE criteria_name = 'Credit Check';
DELETE FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_age > 30 AND credit_score < 700;
DELETE FROM loan_applications WHERE applicant_name = 'Alice Smith' AND loan_amount > 50000;
DELETE FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score < 600 AND score_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM credit_scores WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe' AND credit_score = 650;
DELETE FROM criteria_rules WHERE min_credit_score < 600 AND max_loan_amount > 10000;
